message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its worth to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $8,500. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking to receive for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is too low for me.  Would you consider $9,000?  It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $8,750 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
